title: The Great British Bake Off 2019: Dessert Week recap - Is this the best ever game of Where's Wally? Plus, a historic hat-trick
text:
As the calorific contest passed its midway point, our magnificent seven surviving bakers tackled Prue Leith’s favourite theme: Dessert Week. But who would make a prize pudding of themselves? Here are all the talking points from the sixth episode…

Priya’s exit was a week overdue

Bake Off fans were, in tabloid-speak, “fuming” and “outraged” last week when Leicester marketing consultant Priya O’Shea somehow escaped the brutal double binning. There were even knee-jerk cries of “fix!”. Well, now they got their wish.

After a third patchy week on the bounce, the writing was on the marquee’s canvas walls for Priya. The colour of her meringue cake’s blueberry cream was described as “horrible… a nasty...
